an5.109:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu catuddiso hoti.
an5.109:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an5.109:1.4: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha;
an5.109:1.6: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi;
an5.109:1.7: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an5.109:1.8: Imehi, kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu catuddiso hoti”ti.
